word:
105
The continued use of these nerve irritants is followed by headache, wakefulness, palpitation of the heart, indigestion, trembling, and many other evils; for they wear away the life forces. Tired nerves need rest and quiet instead of stimulation and overwork.  MH 326, 327150 Some have backslidden and tampered with tea and coffee. Those who break the laws of health will become blinded in their minds and break the law of God.  Te 80151
